I couldn\'t help but notice how over half of the people here are saying \'CoD\', so I just have to show you this video I saw on another website.

It just proves, really, why no-one likes CoD.
Call of Duty is just an unremarkable game. I can barely tell the difference between each new iteration of Modern Warfare.
Call of Duty (except Black Ops) and Roblox are tied in my book.

CoD can never beat the creepiness of Slender, the randomness of Mario, the platform gameplay of Sonic, the creativity of LBP, the science of Portal, the epicness of Half Life, the sarcasm of KSP, or the anythingness of Minecraft.

He's no gamer!

You're right, no sane person (who isn't under 7) likes CoD
Any of the EA sports games. They get worse ever year.
I have yet to play a game I really dislike, I have played some which were utterly boring though.

Roblox had an awesome community in early 2009, but past that just really really sucked.

The game is still good, but the community right now? can't bear it.
